caption.p: Precipitation response and the corresponding aerosol forcing. (a, c) Total response in CGCMs and (b, d) fast response in AGCMs of precipitation (Figures 1a and 1b) and 550 nm aerosol optical depth (AOD) (Figures 1c and 1d) to historical aerosol forcing using the five common models (AOD data are only available for three of the five models). In Figures 1a and 1b, stippling denotes four out of five models agree on the sign of change, units are mm d −1.
